```{r, chunk 1}
#reading in the first two VCF file with VCFR
vcf_x <- vcfR::read.vcfR("VCF_SRP199233/SRX5884275_svtyper.vcf", verbose = FALSE)
vcf_x
str(vcf_x)
strwrap(vcf_x@meta[1:7])
strwrap(vcf_x@gt[1:6, 1:2])
head(vcf_x@fix)





vcf_y <- vcfR::read.vcfR("VCF_SRP199233/SRX5884276_svtyper.vcf", verbose = FALSE)
vcf_y
str(vcf_y)
strwrap(vcf_y@meta[1:7])
strwrap(vcf_y@gt[1:6, 1:2])
head(vcf_y@fix)
```

```{r, chunk 2}
#downloading the gff files and installing a package to unzip the gff file.

download.file("ftp://ftp.ensembl.org/pub/release-98/gff3/mus_musculus/Mus_musculus.GRCm38.98.gff3.gz",destfile = "Mus_musculus.GRCm38.98.gff3.gz")

library("R.utils")

gunzip("Mus_musculus.GRCm38.98.gff3.gz")

```

```{r, chunk 3}
# reading in the FASTA and GFF files
dna <- ape::read.dna("Mus_musculus.GRCm38.dna_sm.toplevel.fa", format = "fasta",skip = 0, nlines = 0, comment.char = "#", as.character = FALSE, as.matrix = NULL)


gff <- read.table("Mus_musculus.GRCm38.98.gff3", sep = "\t", quote = "")
```

```{r, chunk 4}
chrom_x <- create.chromR(name='Supercontig', vcf=vcf_x, seq=dna, ann=gff)
plot(chrom_x)




```

```{r, chunk 5}
chrom_y <- create.chromR(name='Supercontig', vcf=vcf_y, seq=dna, ann=gff)
plot(chrom_y)
```
